body:
So, I have been thinking about making a walls tournament seeing the Officials are busy with the League and SG Unofficial Tournament  I thought I would make an Unofficial Walls Tournament because the walls Community has been asking for one.

I'm looking for suggestions on what Date(s) and Time(s) to do this on.

I also want to get an idea on how many teams will participate the first 7 people to contact me with the 4 players that will be representing in the tournament.

Contact Info:

dawteal@outlook.com

Prizes will be decided when the tournament is over which the three winning teams.

I have talked to  many people about it like Dawning and Posighdun and I'm gonna look at what they did in the past maybe use a few of there tricks to make the tournament even better.

Teams Accepted Already:

-Monkey Mafia


Thank you for your time :D

title: Walls  Unofficial Tournament In Progress...
